name: The Show Must Go On (leefu)
description:
### It's the biannual blob ball band and you've been assigned the role of blob-conductor!

#### **Every 10 seconds** a new member of the blob band will join the march and it's your job to keep that blob on beat.

🥁- Set the beat down with the drummer

🎺- Control the other instruments and match the timing of the beat

🎸- The better your timing, the better the grade you receive

🎷- Travel the world and keep your 10-second rhythms in sync!
